name: mikroe.click.adc23
short_description: ADC 23 Click is a compact add-on board that converts an analog voltage into a digital representation. This board features the ADS127L11, a wide-bandwidth 24-bit delta-sigma analog-to-digital converter from Texas Instruments. It is capable of data rates up to 400ksps using a wideband filter and up to 1067ksps using a low-latency filter. It also offers an excellent combination of AC performance and DC precision with low power consumption.
